import About from "./About"; import Home from "./Home"; import Contact from "./Contact"; import Certificate from "./Certificate"; import Education from "./Education"; import Experience from "./Experience"; import Container from 'react-bootstrap/Container'; import Nav from 'react-bootstrap/Nav'; import Navbar from 'react-bootstrap/Navbar'; import NavDropdown from 'react-bootstrap/NavDropdown'; import {Link} from "react-scroll" import "../App.css" function NavigationBar() { const [isMobile, setIsMobile] = useState(false) const toggleMobileMenu = () => { setIsMobile(!isMobile) } return (
  • About
  • Certificate
  • Education
  • Experience
  • Contact
); } export default NavigationBar
